characterDescription:
Tigzikk is an aging thief who is accompanied by Lift (who knew him well) in their infiltration of the Bronze Palace in Azir. He is considered to be the learned one in the group of six men - inclusive of Huqin, Gawx, and Maxin - because he can cuss in three languages.
Tigzikk insists that there will be chaos and danger in the Palace because there will be both many people and many bodyguards within it on the night they've chosen to infiltrate it. He is also the one who suggested the infiltration.

characterDetails.Appearance: Tigzikk is dark-skinned like his compatriots, though he wears fancy clothing.
